access: You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Demolitionist](/Feats.aspx?ID=3287) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Dwarf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=54" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 201 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Access**
You are from Dongun Hold or Alkenstar.

</column>

---

You know how to destroy objects with a well-placed explosion. Whenever you hit with a bomb Strike against a trap or an unattended object, you ignore the first 5 points of the object's Hardness.
name: Demolitionist
